tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor is true to her profession.Takes care like a mother.Follows up  till the patient gets recovered.She diagnosed many things online itself which many doctors didn't diagnose even after n number of blood tests.

I am thankful to her and practo for meeting her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly and patiently listens to what we explain.  The most impressive thing is doctor follows up until the child gets better. Almost everyday Sridevi madam asks whether the kid is doing well.  Very good doctor. We always go to her whenever our kid falls sick.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had a great experience with madam. We were very worried as my son's (7 weeks old)  rash was getting worse over 20 days. Her treatment made it better only in two days. She explained everything patiently and gave simple instructions. We are grateful to her for her care,  concern,  and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I don't have words to  thanks the docotr for my daughter treatment. I have been to the **** hospital in City they said different thing but doctor has treated very well to my daughter. Again and again thanks for practo team and Dr. Sridevi  may god bless her shower his blessings on her always l.

review: We consulted for cold for our baby, She is treating in-her home , she is very humble and neatly explained everything. And not proscribed too much medicine instead of that she explained diet change and my baby cured within a four days . We are satisfied with Mam treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Highly recommend doctor for your child. Doctor was constantly in contact with me about my baby’s health, guided me through out. Genuinely very helpful and listens with utmost patience. I am very grateful to get in contact with her especially in this pandemic had my appointment online, which went smooth without any discomfort. 
100% recommend consult with Dr.C Sridevi. I am definitely going to continue with mam with my future consultations as well in regard with baby diet .
